snippet.title: D.R.O.N.E. Action Trailer - Extended Version
snippet.description:
D.R.O.N.E. is a community driven online multiplayer action/building game. Set in the Milkyway in the 3rd millennium, DRONE is free of current technological constraints. Players create vehicles and arenas and upload them to a community hub where they get discovered, played and rated by the community.

There is also an Short Version of this Trailer: https://youtu.be/_rYucL6Fs4M

The arenas are built with the in-game editor. The footage is recorded in-game with an internal pre-alpha build. 

Be part of our community and help us in our preparation for crowdfunding. Make sure to like, subscribe and share! For more infos, screenshots and videos visit our site: http://dronethegame.com

For sharing and voice overs, a good quality version of this video can be downloaded here:
https://goo.gl/GPnY69

Join our social media:
http://facebook.com/dronethegame
http://twitter.com/drone_the_game

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The music in the beginning is:
"Where You Do Belong" appearing on "Cullah The Wild" (2015) by Cullah - Available at: http://www.cullah.com 
Under CC BY SA license http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
